Class Scaler

  • java.lang.Object
    • nachogame.Scaler

  • public class Scaler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for scaling space objects.
    Author:
    Jon DeWent, Cheng Li, Ryan Bassor

      static int[] calcDimensions(double aspectRatioYOverX, double portion)

    • Method Detail

      • calcDimensions

        public static int[] calcDimensions(double aspectRatioYOverX,
                                   double portion)
        This class returns the new scaled dimensions necessary for rendering images on the screen for a given portion of the desired screen size.
        Parameters:
        aspectRatioYOverX - - Aspect ratio of original image, with the height divided by the width.
        portion - - The percentage of the screen width the image should assume.
        Returns:
        An array giving the pixels of the scaled image size First is for width, second is for height.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - If something went wrong.
